name: 曾俊儒
objective:
本課程旨在教授學生，尤其是創業 / 設計經理，尋找商業案例研究和技術，以快速將創新產品或服務推向市場並收集可操作的客戶見解。它適用於從中小型企業到企業以及一系列工業領域的一系列組織。本課程有助於解決經理面臨的持續壓力，要求他們進行創新並為客戶推出新穎的產品和服務。我們打算引導他們進行整體思維，以推進商業戰略和創業精神。

This course aims to teach students, especially entrepreneurial/design managers, looking for business case studies and techniques to introduce innovative products or services to market quickly and collect actionable customer insights. It applies to a range of organisations from small-medium-sized enterprises to corporates and across a range of industrial segments. This course helps address the constant pressure managers face to be innovative and introduce novel products and services for their customers. We intend to guide them in holistic thinking to advance business strategy and entrepreneurship.
schedule:
What is a design-led strategy?
Primary market research and problem statement definition
Prototyping and product ideation
Design-led strategy in practice: Business case studies
Business case study writing up
scorePolicy: 課程參與：25%；課程報告：50%；課程發表：25%
materials:
•　　Reading pack.
•　　Slected case studies
•　　Kenneth B. Kahn, editor (2013) “The PDMA Handbook of New Product Development,” 3rd Edition, John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
